name: Interior Worlds
storyline: Empty lots. Blackened buildings. Dimly lit hallways. They all live and breathe just as we do. Welcome to Interior Worlds; an ambient first-person exploration game where you'll dive into strange, yet familiar spaces. Temporary gaps and portals we cross at some point or another - now yearning for a closer look. A look that can only be seen properly through the lens of an SLR camera.
summary: Interior Worlds is an ambient first-person exploration game where you take pictures of liminal spaces.
